DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to gain information on reticulocyte neocytolysis in patients treated with ESA with regard to different types of ESA.
DOC.brief_title: Neocytolysis in the Treatment of Renal Anemia With Erythropoieses Stimulating Agents (ESA)
DOC.criteria: signed informed consent age > 18 years, dialysis dependent chronic renal failure hemodialysis three times a week Kt/V > 1,2 od URR > 65% hemoglobin between 11 and 13 g/dl within the last 2 months hemoglobin change +/ 1g/dl within the last 4 weeks ESA for at least 8 weeks Ferritin > 300 ng/ml and Tsat > 25% Significant bleeding in the last 8 weeks blood transfusion within the last 8 weeks hemoglobin disorder hemolysis Malignant disease Significant inflammation Acute infection CRP > 30 mg/l Temporary vascular dialysis access Vitamin B12 deficiency Folic acid deficiency Not controlled hyperparathyroidism Not controlled hypertension Epilepsia within thze last 6 months Thrombocyte count > 500 x 10^9 /l
